Description: You pinpoint the perfect place to strike a creature with a horn as strong as steel. This move is guaranteed to hit for steel damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
